amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to reduce services under the Veterans Crisis Line.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3432 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3432 proposed by Senator Blumenthal to Amendment SA 3411. To prohibit the use of funds to reduce services under the Veterans Crisis Line.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3432 proposed by Senator Blumenthal to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3432 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
